One of These Days

2010 And Beyond

30 Dec 2010
¶

The year being just about over, it’s time to write one of those summary posts. I’ll keep it brief!

 

  		




  
    

      ¶
    

    
From starting my first company, to finishing a degree in Software Engineering, to starting full time freelancing, the year has been an almost overwhelming learning curve. I wouldn’t, however, change a second of it. Thanks especially to the people I’ve met through study, work, meetups, twitter, and everywhere else; you’ve all been amazing, and helped make the year an absolute blast.

  		
  
    

  		




  
    

      ¶
    

    
Slightly drained now, I’m looking forward to a bit of recuperation, and then will be right back into it next year, 2011.

  		
  
    

  		




  
    

      ¶
    

    
To those of you who’ve visited me here I sincerely thank you, and I hope you’ll stick around for a hopefully more frequent and interesting year of posting to come!

  		
  
    

  		




  
    

      ¶
    

    
Sam


  		
  
    

  		






    








            

            

                
The thoughts and ramblings of Sam Dalton - Auckland, New Zealand
